platforms.name: SearchUnify
platforms.description: SearchUnify Agentic AI suite is designed to transform the end-to-end support cycle with greater autonomy and intelligence, comprising nine specialized agents for various support tasks.
key_features: Advanced technologies like GenAI, NLP, ML, and LLMs

platforms.name: Sana Agents
platforms.description: No-code, enterprise-grade AI automation agents that stay grounded in your data lake and orchestrate 100+ tools.
key_features: Data grounding via RAG for accurate, compliant automation
No-code canvas for business user configuration

platforms.name: Beam AI
platforms.description: Beam AI is a modular Agent Operating System built specifically for enterprises, enabling true agentic automation with goal-driven reasoning.

platforms.name: Assistents.ai
platforms.description: A no-code platform that allows businesses to build AI agents tailored to their workflow, automating repetitive tasks and managing customer relations.

platforms.name: Moveworks
platforms.description: Moveworks offers an AI Agent Marketplace with pre-built AI agents that automate repetitive tasks and boost productivity.
